t:
She sat there, chained to her bed, crying. 

She had told her parents that
she was homosexual.

And now they're going
to prove her wrong.
c:
Rape wasn't even the worst thing that happened.
Or maybe it was, I'm no one to judge.



#chain #bed #cry #homosexuality #wrong #disbelief #parents





A little tribute on the last day of #pridemonth.
